name: Nokiasphere
description:
Blast away from your little home planet as a space defender in this thrilling action arcade game that could have been made for the Nokia 3310 of old.

This game features a revolutionary leveling system where the higher your score goes, the more difficult it gets. How long can you fend off the alien threat and protect your Nokiasphere?

*Now with power ups!

Post your high score in the comments!

Controls:

Movement: W&D or Arrow keys

Shoot: Space

Mute: M

Made for NOKIA 3310 JAM 5 by Avis with music by Voltamass
